title: Gold Bond Neck & Chest Firming Cream 2 oz., Clinically Tested Skin Firming Cream
description: When you look in the mirror, does your neck and chest area give away your age? With Gold Bond, you can celebrate the skin that has been with you every day of your life while caring and helping improve its appearance. Gold Bond Neck & Chest Firming Cream contains hyaluronic acid and visibly firms neck & chest skin to reveal younger-looking skin. Your neck and chest area has different skin from the other skin on your body, and this formula works on this delicate area to help visibly improve elasticity and firmness. It's uniquely formulated with a blend of key ingredients to provide long lasting hydration.Your skin is a champion. One that never settles for silver. Gold Bond is high performance skin care for real life so you can be your best while keeping your skin at its best.
